channel.title: mpdata on ThingsDB documentation
channel.description: Recent content in mpdata on ThingsDB documentation

item.title: len
item.description: Returns the length of mpdata in bytes. This function does not generate an event. Function mpdata.len() Arguments None Return value Returns length in bytes. Example This code uses len(): user_info('admin').len(); Example return value in JSON format (size may be different) 358

item.title: load
item.description: Load mpdata into ThingsDB. This function does not generate an event. Function mpdata.load() Arguments None Return value Returns a ThingsDB object. Example This code uses load(): admin = user_info('admin').load(); // `admin` is now a ThingDB object. admin.name; Return value in JSON format "admin"
